verbose_text: Consistent with the in vitro IC 50 of VPS34-IN1 for Vps34 being 25 nM (XREF_FIG B and Supplementary Figure S1), treatment of cells with 0.01 muM VPS34-IN1 induced a weak effect on GFP-2xFYVE Hrs localization, whereas 0.1 muM and 1 muM VPS34-IN1 induced ~ 50% and ~ 80% respectively dispersal of GFP-2xFYVE Hrs endosomal localization (XREF_FIG).
evidence: muM VPS34-IN1 induced ~50% and ~80% respectively dispersal of GFP-2xFYVE Hrs  endosomal localization
